Introduction
This topic contains information about medical records that reveal the existence of a dependent that is not on a Veteran’s award, including
action to take when medical records reveal the existence of a dependent that is not on a Veteran’s award
, and
assigning an effective date based on information about dependents that VA discovers in medical records
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Relationship and Dependency
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
